description:
PMI®, as the global leader in project management, administers PMI-ACP® certification, which is the most popular agile certification for agile practitioners. One of the criteria to apply for this exam is a mandatory 21 hours of agile education, which this course provides conveniently over the web.

Agile practices are being adopted in many industries across the world. Specifically the software development industry has embraced this concept in a big way leading to better success on projects. The future looks extremely promising for agile proponents.

PMI-ACP certification is focused on the understanding of agile principles and practices that enables projects to provide business value in an incremental fashion. PMI recommends 11 reference books for study and the exam consists of answering 120 multiple choice questions in 3 hours.

ProplanX experts have ensured that this course correlates to the examination contents as published by PMI, including incorporating the knowledge drawn from the reference books.

Take up this complete course package and get the most definitive edge required to pass Project Management Institute’s Agile Certified Practitioner (PMI-ACP) exam!

Verifiable Course Completion Certificate will be provided after successful completion of this course.


Benefits of PMI-ACP Certification:

  • Globally recognized certification from Project Management Institute
  • Better job prospects, possibly leading to higher salary
  • Demonstration of agile knowledge including theory and practices
  • (For PMPs) 21 PDUs for maintaining PMP certification

Our Approach to Your Learning:

  • You work along with a project team on a real life Case Study
  • We engage you with Video Lectures, Activity and Pop-Quiz throughout the course
  • Participate in the (video based) Question / Answer sessions, Review, and Glossary cum Flash Card to help consolidate your understanding
  • You practice Tests in many chapters to further help consolidate your understanding of the subject (total 140 practice questions)
  • We completely test your understanding with a full length 120 question three-hour mock exam. You also benefit from an extensive explanation for each question

Testimonials:

Visit ProplanX to view what other professionals are saying about this course!


Course Materials:

You have access to the following course materials:

  • Online access to over 40 video lessons (over 10+ hours of content)
  • Downloadable videos, eBooks and other assets help you to prepare offline, even while you are on the move
  • 7 Practice tests with 20 questions each for a total of 140 questions
  • One full length 120 question PMI-ACP Practice Mock Test (paid customers please write to info@proplanx.com for 30 days test access)

Study Duration:

You should expect to spend at least 21 hours, as detailed below:

  • 13 hours to study 17 sections containing extensive video and text content
  • 4 hours for topic-wise practice tests (140 questions) and prescribed activities
  • 4 hours for one full length final exam (120 questions) plus detailed review


How to contact the Instructor?

Please write to info@proplanx.com for any questions or instructor assistance.

When instructor is available, you should expect to hear within 24 hours.
title: PMI Agile Certified Practitioner (PMI-ACP®) Exam Prep
